actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow the Internal Revenue Service to prescribe and update a standard mileage rate for the charitable use of a passenger automobile.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to repeal the standard mileage rate for use of a passenger automobile for purposes of computing charitable deductions.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow the Internal Revenue Service to prescribe and update a standard mileage rate for the charitable use of a passenger automobile.
